(:action obtain ; Obtain an item and update its state
  :parameters (?agent - person ?item - object ?location - place)
  :precondition (and (at ?agent ?location) (at ?item ?location) (for_sale ?item))
  :effect (and (inventory ?agent ?item) (not (at ?item ?location))

(:action kneel ; Assume a kneeling position in a specified location
  :parameters (?p - person ?loc - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (not (kneeling ?p)))
  :effect (kneeling ?p)
)
